casebody.data:
CONTINENTAL CASUALTY COMPANY, Appellant, v. OHIO EDISON COMPANY, Appellee. No. 7660. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Jan. 10, 1939. Bulkley, Hauxhurst, Inglis & Sharp, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellant. Harrington, Huxley & Smith, of Youngstown, Ohio, for appellee.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.. •

PER CURIAM.

The judgment below is reversed and the cause remanded to the District Court for trial upon the authority of Fidelity & Casualty Company v. Federal Express, Inc., et al., and Fidelity & Casualty Company v. Fornaro Company, 6 Cir., 99 F.2d 681, decided November 10th, 1938.
